name: Color Jump (itch) (Pixum)
description:
Color Jump is an endless scrolling platformer where you have to work with colours in order to ascend further.

This game was made within one week as a personal game jam.

Try to achieve a new highscore by jumping up the platforms.
Feel free to share your highscores in the comments below!

Enjoy! :D

Controls:
- LMB/RMB or left/right arrow keys  -> to switch colours
- A/D or X/C -> to move

Credits:
Soundtrack by Swngyill YOON
